statements: SELECT * FROM OsteoporosisTracking ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, bone_density FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE measurement_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE bone_density > 0.5 ORDER BY bone_density DESC;
SELECT MAX(bone_density) AS max_density FROM OsteoporosisTracking;
SELECT * FROM OsteoporosisTracking ORDER BY measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, bone_density FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE bone_density > 0.5
SELECT * FROM OsteoporosisTracking WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY measurement_date
SELECT AVG(bone_density) AS avg_density, measurement_date FROM OsteoporosisTracking GROUP BY measurement_date
SELECT patient_id, MAX(bone_density) AS max_density FROM OsteoporosisTracking GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patient WHERE age >= 30 AND age <= 50;
SELECT * FROM BoneDensityMeasurement WHERE density_value > 0.8 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT measurement_type FROM BoneDensityMeasurement ORDER BY measurement_type;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM BoneDensityMeasurement WHERE density_value > 0.5;
SELECT measurement_id, patient_name, measurement_date, density_value FROM BoneDensityMeasurement JOIN Patient ON BoneDensityMeasurement.patient_id = Patient.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient
SELECT id, name, age FROM patient WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age FROM patient WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_id, date, bone_density FROM bone_density ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE id IN (1, 3)
SELECT * FROM bone_density
SELECT id, patient_id, date FROM bone_density ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient WHERE age >= 30
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient.id, patient.name, research_data.study_date, research_data.research_notes FROM patient JOIN research_data ON patient.id = research_data.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT center_id, name FROM ResearchCenter;
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT Patient.name, Patient.age, BoneDensity.density FROM Patient LEFT JOIN BoneDensity ON Patient.patient_id = BoneDensity.patient_id;
SELECT Patient.name, ResearchCenter.name AS CenterName FROM Patient, ResearchCenter WHERE Patient.age > 30 AND Patient.gender = 'Female';

SELECT Patient.name, ResearchCenter.name AS CenterName, ResearchTeam.member_count FROM Patient JOIN ResearchCenter ON Patient.patient_id = ResearchCenter.center_id JOIN ResearchTeam ON ResearchCenter.center_id = ResearchTeam.center_id;
SELECT Patient.name, BoneDensity.density, BoneDensity.measurement_date FROM Patient JOIN BoneDensity ON Patient.patient_id = BoneDensity.patient_id WHERE BoneDensity.density > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, bone_density FROM patient_data WHERE bone_density >= 0.5;
SELECT center_name, location FROM research_centers;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, bone_density_value, measurement_date FROM patient_data JOIN bone_density_measurements ON patient_data.patient_id = bone_density_measurements.patient_id WHERE bone_density_value > 0.8 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;

SELECT research_centers.center_name, research_studies.study_name, study_participants.enrollment_date FROM research_centers JOIN research_studies ON research_centers.center_id = research_studies.center_id JOIN study_participants ON research_studies.study_id = study_participants.study_id ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, bone_density_value FROM patient_data JOIN bone_density_measurements ON patient_data.patient_id = bone_density_measurements.patient_id ORDER BY age DESC, bone_density_value ASC;
